content: snap snap **alec the alligator** is a pocket-sized snappy toy you can carry with you on your adventures designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz alec is knitted single pointed needles not in the round the alligator is worked in acrylic yarns and incorporates stockinette and garter stitch for texture **needles** a pair of 3 25mm single pointed knitting needles us 3 **recommended yarn** 100% acrylic 4 ply sport/fingering weight or dk double knitting/light worsted weight/8 ply yarns **notions** a darning or tapestry needle for seaming toy filling and toy safety eyes **sizes** one size only - 19cm long **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include casting on and off knits purls increases and decreases and seaming to finish **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 3 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2018 amanda berry all rights reserved
